Value.label: Set to Default
Value.Help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

Value.label: Startup with last known socket status
Value.Help: The state in what the switch is when power is supplied.

Value.label: Relay delay time
Value.Help: When the relay is switched it can't be switched again until the configured time has passed.

Value.label: Led indicator
Value.Help: Show the led state compared to the relay state.
